This is another generic ntr with a nice girl who loves her boyfriend, then some guy who likes her body  finds out and blackmails her into letting him use her however he wants, until she hits that breaking point where she falls in love with this guy for making her feel good.

@The Ahegao God: yeah, this NTR is the most basic NTR. Ex: bf/gf at school, do something and get caught by bad guy (gyaru-oh/ugly bastard teacher), blackmail ensues, gf has to protect bf because of something, they do it, gf starts to fall to pleasure/big dick, bf/gf have sex and gf is unsatisfied, bad guy/gf have sex and either phone/video call bf or do it in front of bf, end. Although, the 1 difference here, was the girl initially confessed.
